review_discussion.author: CohenCyril
review_discussion.comment:
This file should be removed when using the same version as the toolbox. Otherwise one can run
```shell
% nix-shell --run "updateNixpkgsMaster"
```
or to update to the current nixpkgs master
```shell
% nix-shell --run "updateNixpkgs owner branch"
```
to update to a custom branch.

review_discussion.author: CohenCyril
review_discussion.comment:
Caching is done via https://www.cachix.org/ and there is a token in the math-comp organization to authenticate and store the results. Any CI build is stored globally and can be used on one's own computer by running
```shell
nix-env -iA nixpkgs.cachix
cachix use coq
cachix use coq-community
cachix use math-comp
```
as described in https://github.com/math-comp/math-comp/wiki/Using-nix
